data.message: I had an email sent to me from someone pretending to be facebook stating I had 2 new friend request.  when I clicked the link it was not from facebook.  How do send a screen print of this privacy violation to your security department?   I have already completed the security process on my account and changed my password.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us, Robin.  If an email or Facebook message looks strange, don't click any of the links or open any attachments. Please report this message as spam using this tip: http://bit.ly/2nnniAd. -Joe
